reviewText:
It's hard to believe that Trace Adkins - the northern Louisiana-born country singer who had a football career in college which ended with a injury - has been performing (and making hit records) for twenty years! This nearly-two-hour-long concert recorded in August 2014 at the Paramount Theater in Huntington, NY features all his hits - including "Every Light in the House" (which he performs at EVERY performance) - and a few new ones is a lot of fun. He sings and, sometimes plays (note that he is NOT the lead guitar player) guitar and talks very little between the songs.  That "talk" shows up in the 25 minute "bonus interview" which really give you the feeling that he is comfortable controlling his career and choosing his band members. Honestly, you don't usually get to hear Adkins talk or even take his hat off.

There is an eight page color booklet enclosed but the track list and the crew list take up three of those and the others are just photos.

The sound is great and I can't believe that and country music fan (well, modern country, "hat act" fans) wouldn't  enjoy this DVD package.
So, kick your shoes off, pop a beer and enjoy a two- our, 20 song, concert in your living room or den.

I hope you found this review both informative and helpful.

Steve Ramm
"Anything Phonographic"
This album is fabulous and will be played numerous times in our household.
an entire live concert  love it  on my big screen tv

Awesome DVD! Trace is better than ever! It plays on my blue ray player and the color and clarity are great! I love the old songs and he threw in a few new ones! Had to have it and I love it... And Trace!
Anything with Trace is Fantastic!
Love this video, now let me tell you he's the man one hunk of long tall drink of eye candy, and by the way he can sing also. This is a very good video.
Good music dvd.
He's just smokin hot . Great songs but I wanted I GOT MY GAME ON  cause he does. Best DVD for Trace out there!!
A bit disappointed. I've always liked Trace, but . . . not up to what I expected.
LOVE TRACE!  on time
awesome cd

Ok, I have to admit, not only do my husband and I love Trace Adkins, so does our dog.  He is her favorite country artist.  We own every CD and DVD he has put out.  If you like Trace, don't miss his Christmas DVD.  It's really good.
Trace is Great.
It's OK. I like him and some of his current songs, but he and his band left me disappointed on this DVD.
Love everything Trace does
Trace Adkins is a very good Country artist.
I received this dvd for my birthday on 8/17. I've watched it everyday since then. Wonderful quality. Wonderful music.
Awsome CD, highly recommend. Will not disapoint!
good
This an excellent DVD. Concert! I was expecting a little more excitement to this show. Otherwise nice show.

I love Trace Adkins and have seen him in concert before. Live Country makes you feel like you brought him home with you!!
LOVE IT!!!!

As usual it is full of energy. The video shows up close, you are able to see his eyes and the twinkle in them when he sings. The new songs are exceptional . His smile is as sexy as ever. The cost of this is an exceptional value.
LOVE anything TRACE!
It's Trace Adkins - what more do you need to say??
What a great concert!
What can I say? It's Trace, baby!
I have to admit I'm a big fan, so naturally I thought Live Country was great.  Glad I bought it.
My wife loves it so I'm happy!
Another great show.
LOVE it and him
Fabulous CD.
Great as always........
Love Trace Adkins and enjoyed this concert very much.
Awesome

Excellent concert.
Most of his hits that I would like on a greatest hits
Enjoyed this show so much....
Great Concert and great quality too
I would recommend Trace's newest DVD show to anyone who likes his music and seeing him in concert.

If you like Trace Adkins, you'll love "Live Country."  He does lots of old songs, but several new songs.  I like "Timing Is Everything," especially.  That boy can sing, & yes, he's a little naughty---but that's his shtick.  This great-granny has all his music.  Looking forward to his new album, which should come out by mid or late summer.  The new songs on "Live Country" will be in the new album (CD).
Great
You can't go wrong watching Trace Adkins live on stage!  Awesome video!
Trace never lets you down. Great live music!
Wish I had gotten a CD
I absolutely love Trace
I loved it!  Just like having a Trace concert in your living room every day!
So happy  the dvd is excellent.  Trace is best entertainer and singer......multi talented for sure.  He is so kind to his fans.  I try to make every concert he has near me........lovehim
Another great performance, only wish I had seen in person...
Check out Heartbreak Song. I loved it.
Loved it!  I was lucky enough to be at this performance but I was far away from the stage.  It was nice to be up close to the action!
Love all his songs and everything he does..

Live Country is great. I would recommend it to anyone who is a Trace fan.  He gives his all when he performs.  Have seen him at a few live shows.  He is a great entertainer.  I feel that his interview portion of this DVD shows him as a humble/genuine human being.  I had a meet and greet with him after a show at The Ryman a few years ago.  He was a gracious to the last people as he was to the first people in line.  He doesn't pretend to be someone he isn't.  He is what he is.
Loved it
Doesn't get any better than Trace Adkins in your house! Love this DVD!
He is the best
Love this man and this is a great performance!

An awesome DVD!! If you are a Trace fan, it gives you a "fix" when you haven't seem him live in a while. Actually makes you feel like you are there. If you are a country music fan, you will definitely want this. You can't go wrong!!!
Incredible Concert.. Trace as his best!!!  I actually was at this concert at the Paramount. It was incredible!!!
Trace is awesome fantastic performance!!
Absolutely loved it!
I just finished watching this and I can say that it's as though you were there every song is great get it if you like Trace
I loved it.
I love his concert and music on stage.
Great Live Show
Terrific !!!
Better than expected! Trace never disappoints!  Love it!

No "Just Fishin?" Looking around the audience when I saw him, you could tell who the real "Fathers" were. Not a dry eye among us. I wish Trace would sing this song at all of his concerts. It touches the daughters too.
Love it
ok
It's Trace what can I say. I love it!

LOVE, LOVE, LOVE this DVD. OMG, if you are a Trace fan this is a must have.  All time favorite songs and really good new songs. Plus, that Trace smile! If you can't be at a concert, this is truly the next best thing.
If you are a fan of this Man and his VOICE... get yours soon. Almost as good as being there...
Excellent !!!!!!!!!!
I love Trace so I usually buy anything he does!
Christmas gift for my son, who loves Trace Adkins.  A great performance and a good value.
great
Great concert footage.  Clear, and plenty of close ups of Trace Adkins.  Almost as good as seeing him live.
If you're a Trace Adkins fan, you'll enjoy it.
I was very pleased with Live Country. I watched Trace Adkins and felt like I was at the show. It was great. Would recommend.

Since this is a local venue for us and being a Trace Adkins fan this was an excellent purchase since we actually missed this performance. The quality of this video and audio are SUPERB ! I am very glad with this concert DVD.
Very nice, Trace never disappoints.
Liked most of the songs, he is a really talented country artist.
